title: Best Bits with Morgan & Special Guest Scuba Steve
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan & Special Guest Scuba Steve
description:
A WHOLE TWO HOURS of awesome conversations! Morgan and Scuba Steve likely just had a therapy session on the podcast where they talked about some cute life updates with Scuba’s kids, their previous pets and the animals they wish they could own. Then they talk about the state of society lately and how it’s been really hard for all of us. Plus, they shared their top songs, movies, and TV shows of 2021 and some traumatizing Christmas stories.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
